item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, October 12, 2024 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. AMD's Turin: 5th Gen EPYC Launched (109 points | 33 comments)
2. Started a guide to writing FUSE filesystems in Python (179 points | 44 comments)
3. Lm.rs: Minimal CPU LLM inference in Rust with no dependency (225 points | 50 comments)

7. Build systems, not heroes (13 points | 11 comments)
8. How London's Crystal Palace was built so quickly (39 points | 9 comments)

10. The Society in Dedham for Apprehending Horse Thieves (5 points | 2 comments)
11. Working from home is powering productivity (383 points | 254 comments)
12. Windows dynamic linking depends on the active code page (102 points | 25 comments)

20. Io_uring and seccomp (2022) (62 points | 18 comments)

23. Fundamental physics is dying? [video] (88 points | 126 comments)
24. "Begin disabling installed extensions still using Manifest V2 in Chrome stable" (391 points | 379 comments)
25. How long til we're all on Ozempic? (314 points | 1143 comments)
26. Gleam: A Basic Introduction (92 points | 44 comments)
27. A Lisp compiler to RISC-V written in Lisp (229 points | 46 comments)
28. Bear is a tool that generates a compilation database for Clang tooling (33 points | 13 comments)
29. Grokking at the edge of linear separability (77 points | 22 comments)
30. In SSRI withdrawal, brain zaps go from overlooked symptom to center stage (2023) (113 points | 117 comments)
